short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces Twitter's Explore/Trending tabs for a more peaceful viewing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twitter's "Explore" sidebar is angry and restless. This extension removes the Explore/Trending tabs from their most prominent locations, and replaces them with a positive message for a pleasant browsing experience.
